Question: This person was born Eugene Maurice Orowitz in Forest Hills, a neighborhood of Queens, New York.
Hints: Some copies show the artist credited as the "Teenage Werewolf" rather than as this person.
This person appeared on the cover of TV Guide 22 times, second only to Lucille Ball (TV Guide, July 6, 1991).
This person's script fondly recalled brother Hoss, who was initially the story's groom, before Dan Blocker's untimely death.
